title: 1903 NY Giants at the Waldorf Astoria postcard SOLD
author: Bicem

posts.post_title: 1903 NY Giants at the Waldorf Astoria postcard SOLD
posts.post_content:
One of very few known.  Also one of Matty's first cards as well as the very first postcard to show a major league baseball team.

Photo used for the real-photo postcard is by the famed Ben Falk whose studio was on the top floor of the Waldorf Astoria hotel.  I'll also include an original program from the opening of the Waldorf that shows a larger pic of his studio as well as the empty staircase where the Giants would later pose.

Great piece of baseball and New York history and one of the top postcards in the hobby.  Taking serious offers... (interesting trades also considered)


[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/sale/sale/large/1903%20Giants.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/bicem/sale/sale/websize/Waldorf%20back.jpg[/IMG]
It is a real beauty. I wonder what kind of impression it made in Paris.
